constantValues: An association between a patient and an organization / healthcare provider(s) during which time encounters may occur.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: careManager

constantValues: The practitioner that is the care manager/care coordinator for this patient.

members.name: endDateTime

constantValues: The interval during which the managing organization assumes the defined responsibility.

members.name: identifier

constantValues: The EpisodeOfCare may be known by different identifiers for different contexts of use, such as when an external agency is tracking the Episode for funding purposes.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: organization

constantValues: The organization that has assumed the specific responsibilities for the specified duration.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: patient

constantValues: The patient who is the focus of this episode of care.
